briefTitle: Axillary Reverse Mapping (ARM) in Breast Cancer Surgery to Prevent Lymphedema. (ARMtrial)
officialTitle: Axillary Reverse Mapping (ARM). Identification of the Arm Lymphatic Pathways in Breast Cancer Surgery to Prevent Breast Cancer Related Lymphedema (BCRL): a Randomized Clinical Trial.
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Incidence of Breast Cancer Related Lymphedema (BCRL) after Axillary Lymph Node Dissection (ALND)
